K

KIVAKIT_EPOCH_DAY - Static variable in class com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata.Metadata
Start of KivaKit epoch is December 5, 2020 (blue monkey)
kivakit.build.metadata - module kivakit.build.metadata
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata.MetadataUpdater
Writes a build.properties file out to the given output folder with the following entries: build-number - The current build number since the start of the KivaKit epoch build-date - The current build date as [year].[month].[day-of-month] build-name - The current build name
Metadata - Class in com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata
Metadata about the calling KivaKit project as well as a program entrypoint that creates this information when called from maven during the build process.
Metadata.Type - Enum in com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata
The type of metadata.
MetadataUpdater - Class in com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata
This application is run from Maven builds to produce a build.properties file in src/main/java containing the build number, date and name.
MetadataUpdater() - Constructor for class com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata.MetadataUpdater
